home.adventureOpportunitiesSubtitle: Choose your path to adventure. Whether you're looking for a quick escape or an extended journey, we have the perfect experience waiting for you.
home.whatWeDoSubtitle: We create transformative experiences that connect people with adventure and culture

footer.tagline:
Creating unforgettable adventures
and connecting travelers
worldwide.
Your journey to extraordinary
experiences starts here.
footer.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest adventures and exclusive offers.

about.missionText1:
To create a vibrant community where young
Europeans can discover new cultures, build
lasting friendships, and develop into global
citizens through carefully crafted travel
experiences.
about.missionText2:
We believe that travel has the power to break
down barriers, build bridges between cultures,
and inspire the next generation of European
leaders.

becomeMember.whyJoinSubtitle: Unlock a world of exclusive travel opportunities and connect with like-minded adventurers
becomeMember.accessExclusiveTripsDesc: Get priority access to limited Wild Trips, Wild Weekends, and Erasmus+ programs before they're released to the public.
becomeMember.memberDiscountsDesc: Enjoy exclusive discounts on all Wild Trips & Weekends, plus special offers on accommodation and activities.
becomeMember.earlyAccessDesc: Be the first to know about new destinations and opportunities. Book your spot before anyone else.
becomeMember.exclusiveCommunitiesDesc: Join our members-only WhatsApp and Telegram groups to connect with fellow travelers and coordinators.
becomeMember.freeCoordinatorSupportDesc: Get personalized travel advice and support from our experienced coordinators at no extra cost.
becomeMember.validityDesc: Your membership is valid for a full year from the date of purchase, giving you maximum flexibility.

wildWeekend.chooseDestinationDesc: Discover our upcoming group departures, you can choose by destination, month or type of trip. We're sure we have that trip you've been dreaming of.
wildWeekend.bookFlightsDesc: When you receive an email that your trip is 'Confirmed', it means it's official, we're going on a trip! We don't include flights, so you have complete freedom of choice.
wildWeekend.expertCoordinatorDesc: A coordinator will accompany us on our trip, they're another adventure companion who takes care of the logistics and organization of the trip.
wildWeekend.similarAgeGroupsDesc: The travel group will be made up of people your age (25-35 and 35-45 years old). This way you'll share the experience with people similar to you and your interests.
wildWeekend.enjoyBestTripDesc: Connect with your new friends, explore the destination you've chosen and get excited living the experience of your life, we guarantee it will be unforgettable.

wonderPeople.title: Wonderful people who have experienced it tell you about it.

connectStranger.desc1: Tired of a society where it's increasingly difficult to connect with the people around us, this experience is perfect for opening up to meet wonderful people and create unique shared memories.
connectStranger.desc2: Wild Weekend weekends are prepared with care and affection, taking care of every detail to offer incredible adventures and live the event to the fullest. Always with good vibes! ;)
connectStranger.desc3: As they said in a wild weekend: "prepare for everything", that's the best: lots of adventure, personal growth and laughs, ready?
connectStranger.desc4: Several members of the Proactive Future team will coordinate the Wild Weekend to ensure everything runs as smoothly as possible.
connectStranger.desc5: Compare prices online and you'll see that, with everything included, no other price comes close to these. Our goal is to make them affordable.

exploreTrips.title: Explore some of our Wild Weekends to get a better idea.

joinExplorers.title: We are a family of explorers. Are you coming?
joinExplorers.desc1: Huakai is characterized by many things, but above all by creating new bonds from unique experiences.
joinExplorers.desc2: Join our Facebook group and meet other travelers like you!

whatIncluded.title: What does a trip with Proactive Future include?
whatIncluded.everything: Basically from when you're with us: EVERYTHING.

openOpportunities.title: Opportunities open!
openOpportunities.subtitle: It's never been easier to meet new people, live experiences that last forever, and feel a passion for life that's too much to contain. Are you in?

follow.title: Follow Our Journey
follow.subtitle:
Get inspired by real adventures from our community. Follow @{{username}} for daily
doses of wanderlust!

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Continuous feedback helps us build a better platform.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From a small idea to a Europe-wide community

2019.title: The Beginning
2019.description: Founded by a group of former Erasmus students who wanted to continue the magic of cultural exchange.

2020.title: Digital Pivot
2020.description: Adapted to virtual exchanges and built our online community during challenging times.

2021.title: Wild Weekends Launch
2021.description: Introduced short-format adventures perfect for busy young professionals.

2023.title: Recognition
2023.description: Awarded 'Best Youth Travel Organization' by European Travel Association.

2024.title: Growth
2024.description: Welcomed our 2,500th member and launched Wild Trip adventures.

whatIs.title: What is it?
whatIs.description: We invite you to a unique experience exploring other cultures and living adventures in a group of up to 12 people. These are very local backpacking trips, with a lot of flexibility to adapt to the culture, which will allow you to fully immerse yourself in it. Get ready for something really incredible.

when.title: When?
when.description: There are several trips throughout the year, but right now we're doing adventure trips to Egypt and Iceland.

howToParticipate.title: How can I participate?
howToParticipate.description: New trips will be announced on Instagram in the "Open Opportunities" section. After completing a form, the most qualified travelers who best fit the experience will be selected.

aboutEvent.title: About This Event
aboutEvent.desc1: Our internal events are more than just training sessions – they're transformative experiences that shape the future leaders of the travel industry.
aboutEvent.desc2: Join a community of passionate professionals dedicated to excellence in travel coordination, cultural exchange, and creating unforgettable experiences for adventurers worldwide.

experienceEvent.title: Experience Our Events
experienceEvent.subtitle: See what makes our internal events transformative for travel professionals

contact.questionOrIdea:
Have a question or idea in mind?
We're here to listen and help you
every step of the way.

joinOurStory.title: Join Our Story
joinOurStory.subtitle:
Be part of a community that's redefining youth travel across Europe. Your adventure
starts with a single step.

travelInsurance.title:
Travel Insurance
- iati
travelInsurance.description:
Travel insurance worldwide. iati offers great
prices, and if you access it through this link,
you get a 5% discount

sheltersTransportation.title:
Shelters and
Transportation
- REAJ
sheltersTransportation.description: Get your youth hostel card and enjoy discounts on accommodations: 15% on ALSA, Goiko, 10% on FLIXBUS, and other chains. Visit the link and use the discount code "PROACTIVEFUTURE"

fellowExplorer.title:
More than guides — they're
fellow explorers
fellowExplorer.passionateTravelersDesc:
Our coordinators have explored the world themselves and
bring authentic experiences to every trip they lead.

meetCoordinator.title: Meet Our Coordinators
meetCoordinator.subtitle:
Get to know the amazing people who make every Proactive Future
adventure unforgettable

leadAdventure.title: Ready to Lead Adventures?
leadAdventure.subtitle:
Join our team of passionate coordinators and turn your love for travel into a rewarding career. Share your
expertise, create lasting connections, and inspire others to explore the world.

connectingPeople.title: Connecting People
connectingPeople.description:
Our business is deeply human: it's built on relationships and interactions, not just while we're
traveling. We host many events throughout the year to engage with our community
and have our WeRoaders and travel coordinators share their stories. Every day we see the
impact of our work and are reminded that we make a living building relationships and
changing lives. Not many companies can say the same. This is our "why," the reason we
come to work every day, and we consider it a privilege.

geeks.title: For the geeks
geeks.desc1:
Want to know the real story? It was all about
passion, determination, and yes... meeting the
right people at the right time.
geeks.desc2:
Sooner or later, we'll write a book about how we
managed to survive a global pandemic and grow
as a brand. Until then, Fabio writes a yearly
roundup (in English, because we like being
international) every March 21st, which is
WeRoad's birthday (we're Aries, yes).
geeks.desc3:
Sooner or later, we'll write a book about how we
managed to survive a global pandemic and grow
as a brand. Until then, Fabio writes a yearly
roundup (in English, because we like being
international) every March 21st, which is
WeRoad's birthday (we're Aries, yes).
